title: SpaceX launches second mid-inclination rideshare mission
summary: SpaceX launched its second Bandwagon rideshare mission, deploying 30 satellites into mid-inclination orbits. Among the payloads were two synthetic aperture radar (SAR) satellites for ICEYE, which were part of a broader set of customer satellites.

entities.name: ICEYE
entities.involvement: launched two SAR satellites on the mission

entities.name: HawkEye 360
entities.involvement: deployed three satellites for radio-frequency intelligence
